title: Landscape of a Solitary Life
description: This is a story of a woman living the life of a modern day "Walden" in the mountains of Colorado. Jenny escapes the throws of life to a small cabin—no pipes or wires—and thrives in a world she creates for herself. An unexpected and complicated relationship develops after a chance accident brings a visitor into her life. Jenny is faced with the challenge of protecting her solitude while allowing someone to become a part of her world.
author: Jordon Carroll
